sentence: Matthew Fitzpatrick (+5500, $7,700): The Englishman has top 10 finishes in four of his last five stroke-play events, with his one recent weakness — his irons — suddenly firing again.
title: Sleeper picks who could make noise at the Masters (no, not Tiger)
